description: This Dart source file defines the FilterProvider class, which manages filter criteria for a Flutter application. It provides getters, setters, toggle methods, and reset functionality for filter criteria such as hair colors, races, religions, height, and weight ranges, notifying listeners of changes.

classes.name: FilterProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider class managing filter criteria state and providing methods to modify and reset filters.

methods.name: setCriteria
methods.description: Replaces the current filter criteria with a new one and notifies listeners.

methods.name: toggleHairColor
methods.description: Toggles the presence of a HairColor in the hairColors set, or sets it explicitly.

methods.name: toggleRace
methods.description: Toggles the presence of a Race in the races set, or sets it explicitly.

methods.name: toggleReligion
methods.description: Toggles the presence of a Religion in the religions set, or sets it explicitly.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets all filter criteria to default values.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Placeholder method to trigger any matching refresh, currently only notifies listeners.
